column4: Hi is Glade only Gui designer here and QT4 would do same or is bad
Glade is for GTK applications. Qt4 is different toolkit and has its own designer

if you're a programmer looking to pick up a new toolkit,   GTK is usually used with C, and Qt is usually used with C++, both can be used with Python, and there are Ruby bindings for GTK (but i find applications written with them can be a bit unstable, especially if threaded)
